name: The Multiplayer Island of DOOM
description:
by Cormacintosh.

this game was made for a private game jam that me and my friends did.

the unique multiplayer jam. 

the goal was to make a multiplayer game. but make it original and unique.

i won!

Hooray!!!

 enjoy this unique experience with future updates coming soon (such as game ui and player listing in game)

-Cormacintosh
